options.content:
# üè† Household Net Worth Dashboard - Wealth Tracking

**What This Dashboard Shows:** Tracks wealth accumulation and net worth progression over time with health scoring and milestone tracking.

**Key Metrics Explained:**
‚Ä¢ **Net Worth Health Score:** Classification from critical to excellent based on assets vs liabilities
‚Ä¢ **Assets vs Liabilities:** Breakdown with liquidity analysis showing readily accessible funds
‚Ä¢ **Debt-to-Asset Ratio:** Lower percentages indicate stronger financial position
‚Ä¢ **Monthly Progress:** Consistent increases indicate successful wealth building

**Time Windows:**
- Summary KPIs use the most recent complete month.
- Trend panels cover the trailing 12 months unless noted.
- Annual progress panels use complete years only.

**How to Use:** Track wealth building progress with milestone goals. Focus on increasing assets and reducing debt-to-asset ratios over time.

panels.description: Data recency for the current dashboard context.

targets.rawSql:
WITH available_months AS (
  SELECT budget_year_month,
         to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS month_date
  FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth
  WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
),
latest_period AS (
  SELECT MAX(month_date) AS month_date
  FROM available_months
)
SELECT
  to_char((SELECT month_date FROM latest_period), 'Mon YYYY') AS "Data Through",
  to_char(MAX(report_generated_at), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS "Last Refresh"
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth
WHERE to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') = (SELECT month_date FROM latest_period);

panels.title: Data Freshness

panels.description: MOST RECENT COMPLETE MONTH (August 2025): Household net worth data excludes current incomplete month for accurate quarterly review

targets.rawSql:
SELECT net_worth
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY transaction_year DESC, transaction_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Current Net Worth (Aug 2025)

panels.description: Financial health metrics with clear ranges and categories

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  net_worth_health_score,
  CASE 
    WHEN financial_position = 'Critical Debt' THEN 0
    WHEN financial_position = 'High Debt' THEN 20
    WHEN financial_position = 'Negative Net Worth' THEN 40
    WHEN financial_position = 'Low Net Worth' THEN 60
    WHEN financial_position = 'Positive Net Worth' THEN 80
    WHEN financial_position = 'Strong Net Worth' THEN 100
    ELSE 40
  END as financial_position_score,
  CASE 
    WHEN wealth_milestone = 'Crisis Phase' THEN 0
    WHEN wealth_milestone = 'Recovery Phase' THEN 20
    WHEN wealth_milestone = 'Rebuilding Phase' THEN 40
    WHEN wealth_milestone = 'Stability Phase' THEN 60
    WHEN wealth_milestone = 'Growth Phase' THEN 80
    WHEN wealth_milestone = 'Wealth Phase' THEN 100
    ELSE 40
  END as wealth_milestone_score
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY transaction_year DESC, transaction_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Financial Health Status

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  total_assets,
  total_liabilities,
  liquid_assets,
  property_assets,
  non_property_assets
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
WHERE period_end_date < date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)
ORDER BY transaction_year DESC, transaction_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
  to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') as time,
  net_worth,
  rolling_3m_avg_net_worth
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
ORDER BY transaction_year, transaction_month;

panels.description: Assets and liabilities breakdown over time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') as time,
  total_assets,
  total_liabilities,
  liquid_assets,
  property_assets,
  non_property_assets
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
WHERE period_end_date < date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)
ORDER BY transaction_year, transaction_month;

panels.title: Assets & Liabilities Trend

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  mom_net_worth_change,
  mom_net_worth_change_percent,
  debt_to_asset_ratio,
  growth_classification
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY transaction_year DESC, transaction_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
  ytd_net_worth_change,
  yoy_net_worth_change_percent,
  monthly_mortgage_principal_reduction,
  estimated_months_expenses_covered
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY transaction_year DESC, transaction_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

panels.description: Asset allocation trends broken down by account type over time

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') as time,
  property_assets,
  liquid_assets,
  (total_assets - property_assets - liquid_assets) as other_assets
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth
WHERE period_end_date < date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)
ORDER BY transaction_year, transaction_month;

panels.title: Asset Allocation Trends by Type

panels.description: Net worth change drivers showing which account movements contributed most to monthly changes

targets.rawSql:
WITH account_balances AS (
  SELECT 
    ft.transaction_year,
    ft.transaction_month,
    ft.account_key,
    da.account_name,
    da.account_type,
    da.is_liability,
    make_date(ft.transaction_year, ft.transaction_month, 1) AS period_start,
    MAX(ft.account_balance) AS end_of_month_balance
  FROM reporting.fct_transactions ft
  LEFT JOIN reporting.dim_accounts da
    ON ft.account_key = da.account_key
  WHERE make_date(ft.transaction_year, ft.transaction_month, 1) >= date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)::date - INTERVAL '2 months'
    AND make_date(ft.transaction_year, ft.transaction_month, 1) < date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)::date
  GROUP BY ft.transaction_year, ft.transaction_month, ft.account_key, da.account_name, da.account_type, da.is_liability
),
account_changes AS (
  SELECT
    b.account_name,
    b.account_type,
    b.is_liability,
    b.period_start,
    (b.end_of_month_balance - LAG(b.end_of_month_balance) OVER (PARTITION BY b.account_key ORDER BY b.period_start)) as monthly_change
  FROM account_balances b
)
SELECT
  account_name as "Account",
  account_type as "Type",
  CASE WHEN is_liability THEN 'Liability' ELSE 'Asset' END as "Category",
  ROUND(CAST(ABS(monthly_change) as numeric), 2) as "Change",
  CASE
    WHEN monthly_change > 0 AND is_liability THEN 'Increase (Worse)'
    WHEN monthly_change < 0 AND is_liability THEN 'Decrease (Better)'
    WHEN monthly_change > 0 AND NOT is_liability THEN 'Increase (Better)'
    WHEN monthly_change < 0 AND NOT is_liability THEN 'Decrease (Worse)'
    ELSE 'Stable'
  END as "Impact"
FROM account_changes
WHERE period_start = date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE)::date - INTERVAL '1 month'
  AND ABS(monthly_change) > 100
ORDER BY ABS(monthly_change) DESC
LIMIT 10;

panels.title: Net Worth Change Drivers (Top Account Movements)

panels.description: Financial advice and wealth milestone tracking

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  financial_advice as "Financial Advice",
  wealth_milestone as "Wealth Milestone",
  annual_progress_assessment as "Annual Progress",
  net_worth_trend_direction as "Trend Direction"
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY transaction_year DESC, transaction_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Financial Advice & Milestones

panels.description: Asset allocation percentages and deviation from target allocation

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') as time,
  liquid_asset_allocation_pct as "Liquid Assets",
  property_asset_allocation_pct as "Property Assets",
  other_asset_allocation_pct as "Other Assets"
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
ORDER BY transaction_year, transaction_month;

panels.title: Asset Allocation Breakdown Over Time

panels.description: Asset allocation drift from target allocation (60% liquid, 35% property, 5% other)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  liquid_allocation_drift,
  property_allocation_drift,
  other_allocation_drift,
  total_allocation_drift_score
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY transaction_year DESC, transaction_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Allocation Drift from Target

panels.description: Net worth change drivers - asset and liability deltas

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  mom_assets_change,
  mom_liabilities_change,
  mom_net_worth_change
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
WHERE budget_year_month < TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM')
ORDER BY transaction_year DESC, transaction_month DESC 
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Net Worth Change Drivers (Current Month)

panels.description: Net worth change drivers over time showing asset and liability impacts

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  to_date(budget_year_month || '-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') as time,
  mom_assets_change,
  mom_liabilities_change
FROM reporting.rpt_household_net_worth 
ORDER BY transaction_year, transaction_month;

panels.title: Net Worth Change Drivers Over Time

title: Household Net Worth Analysis (Most Recent Complete Month)
